title: President Donald J. Trump is Ensuring that Essential Medical Supplies are Produced in the United States – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
August 6, 2020
We must never be reliant on a foreign nation for America’s medical or other needs.
						President Donald J. Trump					STRENGTHENING MEDICAL SUPPLY CHAINS: President Donald J. Trump is taking bold action to re-shore production of essential medicines, medical countermeasures, and critical inputs.
